name: Deal Dining Club
address: The Dining Club 69 Middle Street Deal CT14 6NP
description: The Dining Club in Deal is now open for a lovely 3 course dinner, packaged up and delivered to your door. - we have selected dates for the coming weeks and each menu is different.  You can eat it on the day of delivery / collection or it will keep for 2-3 days.  Cooking and storing details included on each menu.  Ranked in the top 5 on TripAdvisor, you can be sure that Scottie will deliver a truly memorable meal to enjoy at home.  The usual Membership is not essential but it does help you see the menus before anyone else as limited space is available.  Alternatively, you can find the menus on our website or updated on Facebook - Booking dates provided and made by email. If calling please leave a message and we will get back to you.
